slogan.subtitle: Hi, Iâ€™m Rochenette Legaspina! ðŸ˜Š, passionate about creating meaningful and user-friendly design experiences. Explore my portfolio to see how I bring innovative design solutions to life!

1.title: CountryScape
1.description: Countryscape offers a selection of hotels with stunning views that perfectly match your mood and emotions, providing a tailored vacation experience. Whether you're seeking relaxation, adventure, or a peaceful retreat, each hotel is designed to enhance your stay. With easy booking options, planning your ideal getaway has never been more convenient.

2.title: Food Delivery App
2.description: Food Delivery and Transportation App that offers efficient services for food delivery, as well as transportation for people and goods. It allows users to manage their time better by eliminating the need to leave their home, office, or school for tasks like shopping or collecting items. Additionally the app offers secure and well monitored deliveries, ensures safe transportation and exclusive travel to destinations.

3.title: Web App
3.description: The networking website offers a curated selection of exclusive products, available only through the platform. Focused on health and wellness, the products are carefully chosen to support a balanced lifestyle and promote well-being. Users can access unique items in medicine, supplements, and wellness tools, ensuring they have access to top-quality resources for better health.

4.title: Logistics
4.description: Logistics solutions provide streamlined services for the transportation of goods and resources, optimizing delivery efficiency for businesses and customers alike. The platform allows users to manage their operations seamlessly, reducing the need for time-consuming tasks like coordinating shipments or handling inventory. With secure and reliable tracking systems, it ensures safe and punctual delivery, offering smooth transportation from point A to point B.ess to top-quality resources for better health.

paragraph.1: Iâ€™m Rochenette Legaspina, a UI/UX designer from the Philippines with a Bachelorâ€™s degree in Computer Engineering. My design approach combines creativity with a focus on user-centered solutions. My journey into UI/UX design began in college, where I joined a student organization passionate about the gaming industry. I started as a 3D modeler, then expanded my skills to 3D texturing and retopology, which sparked my fascination with the technical aspects of design. A pivotal moment was meeting a mentor who introduced me to UI/UX design. Inspired by their guidance, I shifted my focus to creating functional and visually compelling user interfaces and experiences.
paragraph.2: After graduating, I gained real-world experience as a UI/UX designer at a software company. Seeking a broader understanding of the development process, I later worked as a Systems Analyst, collaborating closely with clients and team members. This role helped me bridge the gap between design and development, with the goal of creating designs that are both visually appealing and purpose-driven, solving real user problems.

alliance.title: System Analyst and a UI/UX Desginer

description.1: Documented Functional Specifications (FSD) and ensured complete requirements capture.
description.2: Delivered effective solutions to enhance user experience and functionality.
description.3: Analyzed client needs and new feature requirements.
description.4: Provided detailed functionality to the development team.
description.5: Ensured timely resolution of support requests.

description.1: Designed UI/UX for e-commerce platforms, web apps, and logistics systems.
description.2: Created user-centric, visually appealing designs to enhance functionality and user experience.
description.3: Developed logos and branding materials to align with company identities.
description.4: Collaborated closely with clients to understand and meet design requirements.

description.1: Graduated with a Bachelor of Science in Computer Engineering.
description.2: Approved thesis project focused on VR for condos and townhouses.
description.3: Contributed to a game development startup, creating VR experiences for Casa Gorordo Museum.

description.4: Collaborated on creating impactful, data-driven dashboards for business solutions.
